data.system_settings: Google Pixel, Android Pie (August 5th patch, build PPR1.180610.009)
data.expected_result: A notification should appear in the notif tray for any mention / DM received with notifications enabled
data.short_description: Most @ mentions do not create a notification on Android 8/9
data.steps_to_repro: - Ensure discord is running latest alpha build on Android, and phone is up to date - Confirm all notification settings are enabled - Receive a mention (by name, role or everyone) - Not receive notification in notification area - Check your discord a few hours later to see someone was trying to reply to your messages - PLEASE NOTE This is not a five minute thing to find, Quite often I don't see I missed a message until a few hours later, Even though power saving is disabled for discord on my phone, I suspect it has something to do with background processing, as it's most obvious when I've been doing other things, not necessarily with the phone.
